articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Iceland
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Iceland
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Kim Yong Il on Friday sent a congratulatory message to Johanna Sigurdardottir upon her appointment as Prime Minister of Iceland.
					 The message expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would develop in the interests of the peoples of the two countries and wished her success in her work.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of Iceland
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Iceland
 Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Friday sent a congratulatory message to Ossur Skarphedinsson upon his appointment as foreign minister of Iceland.
					 The message wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Defense Minister's Call for War Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Defense Minister's Call for War Flailed
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- The puppet minister of National Defense during his recent visit to the command of the puppet 3rd field army openly called on "the troops to be combat ready to win the battle that may break out right now" while telling the fictitious story about "provocation by the north". 
					 In another development, warmongers of the puppet military reinforced armed forces including warships in the waters along and near the illegal "Northern Limit Line" in the West Sea and formed "a unit on alert to go into action in a half hour" and deployed it on Yonphyong  Islet, crying out for defending the line. They also staged a secret special warfare exercise by use of military planes. 
					
					 On May 13 and 14 they staged a south Korea-U.S. "combined exercise for surprise air assault," kicking up war atmosphere. 
					
					 A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea in a statement issued Saturday said:
					
					 The anti-DPRK war cry again made by the warmongers of the puppet military and a reckless racket for a war kicked up by them  are extremely dangerous military provocations prompted by its criminal design to launch a war of aggression  against the north  at any cost.
					
					 The reality goes to clearly prove that the Lee group is one of heinous war maniacs and anti-reunification traitors who seek to inflict the holocaust of a war on fellow countrymen, denying national unity, reunification and peace.
					
					 The group will get nothing but shameful ruin and death if it makes desperate efforts to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen and ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK quite contrary to the desire of the Koreans for peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 The Lee group had better stop its rash acts, clearly understanding what a miserable end those who disregard the desire of the times and the nation met.

articles.title: Rice-transplantation Begins in DPRK
articles.content:
Rice-transplantation Begins in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- All the cooperative farms, except those in the northern highlands, are transplanting rice seedlings in earnest after Wonhwa Co-op Farm in Phyongwon County, South Phyongan Province kicked it off on May 10.
					The farms have cultivated healthy rice seedlings, overcoming unfavorable conditions from the beginning of the year and are carrying on organizational and political work in a minute way to wind up the rice-transplantation in right time and in a qualitative way as required by the Juche method of farming.
					
					They have rationally distributed manpower and mechanical means and are keeping tilling and harrowing of paddy fields ahead of rice-transplantation, thus registering signal successes from the outset.
					
					Those in South Hwanghae Province have worked out detailed plans according to date and plot and already transplanted rice seedlings in thousands of hectares of fields by concentrating efforts on it.
					
					Similar successes have been reported from co-op farms in North and South Phyongan and North Hwanghae Provinces, too.
					
					The co-op farms on the east coast start rice-transplantation, taking rice seedling and weather conditions into consideration.
					
					The officials and working people in the agricultural field and helpers across the country are working hard with a revolutionary enthusiasm to bring about a decisive turn in the grain production this year.

articles.title: Reconstructed Pyongyang Grand Theatre
articles.content:
Reconstructed Pyongyang Grand Theatre
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Grand Theatre located on a picturesque bank of Taedong River was wonderfully reconstructed as a centre for the cultural and emotional life of the people.
					The theatre, opened in August of Juche 49 (1960), is the cradle of the opera revolution where "The Sea of Blood"-style revolutionary opera was created and a historical building where many literary and artistic works were created and performed.
					
					The Korean-style gable roof tiles of the theatre were replaced with new one and the walls of the building were facelifted with special building materials and embossed decorations. Its inner structure was given modern architectural beauty without any change.
					
					The ceiling of the central hall is decorated with eight fairies of Mt. Kumgang flying in the sky, its wall ornaments in relief glitter with golden color and the ceiling lighting is indirect one.
					
					The large-sized chandeliers were set up newly on the ceiling of the entrance hall, the columns standing on the granite-floor were clad with building materials with special color and the walls were embossed with magnolia and other flowers.
					
					All the ceiling illuminations faced the stage and the aisles were transformed from tiers to gentle slope.
					
					The theatre has an auditorium with more than 1 300 seats, stage, sound and lighting facilities, various training rooms, makeup rooms, catering and hygienic facilities.
					
					In particular, the modern intonation facility, amplifiers, efficient loud-speakers provide stereoscopic effect of the sound and high quality of sound.
					
					The opening and closing ceremonies of the 26th April Spring Friendship Art Festival and performances of the art troupes from various countries were held in the reconstructed theatre.
					
					 The theatre, which is well harmonized with national classic beauty and modern beauty, elegance, grandeur and exquisiteness, gives great delight and optimism to the visitors as a wonderful cultural palace in the Songun era.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Master-Servant Relations between U.S. and Japan
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Master-Servant Relations between U.S. and Japan
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- The United States and Japan are linked by the close alliance while being in the relationship between the "victor in the war" and the defeated country.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The United States has alliance with different countries, but no allies of the U.S. are so close to it as Japan. 
					
					 The U.S. is zealous in putting Japan forward, stroking it. Japan, on its part, has faithfully served its American master with the calculation that its sycophancy toward its master would not only bring greater "benefits" to itself but help consolidate its "position" in the international arena. 
					
					 One may judge that the U.S. is treated by Japan as its master while treating the latter as its servant because the former is not only a "victor in the war" but it has the status of being a permanent member of the UN Security Council. The U.S. does not allow the above-said authority exercised in handling international issues to be weakened even a bit nor does it intend to make any concession to others over that matter. The U.S. is only interested in keeping Japan as its faithful servant and getting it so ready that the former may effectively use the latter any time. And the U.S. does not allow Japan to have a position higher than what the former has in mind. There is not a significant change in the attitude of the U.S. even today. 
					
					 The U.S. is always keen to keep Japan under its watch and control as it does not want to see the latter behave so freely and pleased as to incur its displeasure. 
					
					 It is the true intention of the U.S. to treat Japan, pretending to support the latter before it, while seeking an ax to grind. 
					
					 In the final analysis, the U.S. and Japan are in the relationship in which each is keen to seek its own interests and aims, the former trying to fool the latter and vice versa. The ties between the U.S. and Japan are nothing but the master-servant relations based on each other's ambitions, concludes the article.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Struggle against Lee Group's Deviation from Inter-Korean Declarations
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Struggle against Lee Group's Deviation from Inter-Korean Declarations
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- All Koreans should go united and dynamically struggle against the south Korean ruling forces' deviation from the north-south joint declarations quite contrary to the trend of the times. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed article. 
					
					 It goes on: 
					
					 The deviation from the north-south joint declarations is a grave act of treachery as it means pursuing sycophancy and dependence on outside forces, while doing harm to the national sovereignty and dignity and denying the idea of "By our nation itself," the sacred idea of independence.  
					
					 It is, at the same time, a dangerous anti-peace act aimed at escalating the military confrontation on the Korean Peninsula, deteriorating the situation and bringing the danger of a nuclear war and an unpardonable act of standing in the way of the development of the north-south relations and the country's reunification.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group groundlessly described the point referring to peaceful reunification of the June 15 joint declaration as a point calling for "reunification through communization" and asserted that it should be "abrogated" and dismissed the points of the October 4 declaration calling for terminating the military hostile relations and setting up a lasting peace mechanism as "premature" and refused to implement it. 
					
					 The reality goes to eloquently prove that any departure from the above-said declarations is bound to push the inter-Korean relations to the phase of collapse and render it impossible to achieve national reconciliation and unity and the country's reunification. 
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should hold fast to the said declarations, the sacred banner of the independent national reunification, and intensify the struggle to implement them.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Urged to Release Pro-reunification Figures
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Urged to Release Pro-reunification Figures
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) on May 12 made public a statement urging the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to stop at once the shuddering campaign of fascist suppression and release the arrested members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and reunification movement organizations as early as possible.
					 The statement said the Lee group's wholesale suppression of the reunification movement organizations including the South Headquarters of Pomminryon is no more than desperate efforts to dampen the daily growing desire to implement the north-south joint declarations in south Korea and tide over its ruling crisis caused due to the unpopular policy.
					
					 With no amount of desperate effort can the Lee group stamp out Pomminryon, the statement said, adding that the Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters of Pomminryon will pool efforts with all other fellow countrymen at home and abroad in the struggle against the group's suppression and intensify the struggle to bring earlier national reunification.

articles.title: Pomchonghakryon Vows to Struggle to Force Lee Myung Bak Regime Step down
articles.content:
Pomchonghakryon Vows to Struggle to Force Lee Myung Bak Regime Step down
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification (Pomchonghakryon) in south Korea on May 13  made public a statement in which it vowed to take the lead in the struggle to force the Lee Myung Bak regime to step down.
					 The statement said it is the anachronistic and traitorous violence that the Lee regime is suppressing the activities of the pro-reunification patriotic forces for implementing the June 15 joint declaration on the charge of violation of the "National Security Law" and labeling the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification an "anti-state organization." 
					
					 Noting that the Lee regime forsaken by the people for its traitorous and undemocratic tyranny is now working hard to stamp out the pro-reunification patriotic forces in a bid to prolong its remaining days, the statement termed its outrageous and hateful suppression a reckless act of challenging the desire of the nation for the reunification of the country.
					
					 All the patriotic people desirous of reunification should turn out in the movement to implement the June 15 joint declaration and in the anti-Lee Myung Bak struggle, the statement urged.

articles.title: Annual Meeting of Poland-Korea Association Held
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of Poland-Korea Association Held
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Poland-Korea Association was held in Byalystok on May 8.
					 Present at the meeting were members of its Central Committee and chairmen of its branches. The DPRK ambassador to Poland and staff members of his embassy were present there on invitation. 
					
					 The meeting discussed the association's working plan for this year, the issue of inaugurating a new branch and the issue of conducting widespread activities for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people working fresh miracles and innovations to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012 without fail. 
					
					Speakers at the meeting praised the Korean people for having achieved eye-opening successes in building an economic power under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. Some time ago, the Korean people successfully launched satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 by their own efforts and with their own technology, they noted, adding that this is a demonstration of a high level of science and technology of Songun Korea and its courage and pluck to attain the gigantic goal of a great prosperous and powerful nation without fail by frustrating the anti-DPRK moves of the hostile forces.
					
					 Pointing to the fact that the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula are firmly defended and guaranteed thanks to the strong war deterrent based on the capability for self-defence, they wished the Korean people greater successes in their efforts to build a socialist thriving nation and achieve the cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Bulletin on DPRK Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Bulletin on DPRK Published in Mexico
 Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea published the 35th issue of its bulletin titled "DPRK, Chollima in the past and a great revolutionary surge today."
					 The bulletin carried a picture of the Chollima Statue.
					
					 The bulletin in an article said that there is in Pyongyang a statue depicting Chollima, a legendary winged horse flying high into the sky, adding that the horse represents the desire and spirit of the Korean people to advance at a higher tempo to achieve a higher goal, bringing about uninterrupted leap forward and innovations.
					
					 In the middle of the last century the Korean people made an astonishing progress by energetically dashing in the spirit of Chollima, the article noted, and continued:
					
					 The Korean people have turned out in the campaign to open a gate to a thriving nation without fail in 2012, the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, the father of socialist Korea, by effecting the same new great revolutionary surge as they did in those days. 
					
					 A Chollima movement, the first of its kind in the DPRK, could be launched in the post-war period entirely thanks to the single-minded unity between the leader and the people.
					
					 The workers in Kangson produced 120,000 tons of steel slab from a blooming mill with a rated capacity of 60,000 tons in hearty response to the call of the President.
					
					 The torch of this innovation movement was spread all over the country in a moment and the Korean people brought about a great revolutionary surge, sharing their will and breath with the President.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the Chollima Steel Complex on December 24, 2008 that is more than 50 years since then, kindling the torch of a new great revolutionary surge.
					
					 The DPRK stunned the world with the great Chollima upswing in the post-war period. The international community will witness what miracles and dynamic progress the DPRK will bring about by effecting a new revolutionary surge on the basis of the strong political and military might.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam regresa a Pyongyang de su viaje a varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam regresa a Pyongyang de su viaje a varios paises
Pyongyang, 16 de mayo (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, repatrio el dia 15 despues de concluir su visita a Sudafrica, Zimbabwe y Singapur.
					  Llegaron junto con el el ministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Ryong Nam, el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun y otros acompanantes.
					
					  En el aeropuerto ellos fueron acogidos por Yang Hyong Sop, vicepresidente del Presidium de la APS, y otros funcionarios, asi como el embajador chino en Corea, Liu Xiaoming.

articles.title: CNDPC condena nuevos alborotos de los belicistas surcoreanos
articles.content:
CNDPC condena nuevos alborotos de los belicistas surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 16 de mayo (ATCC) -- En su reciente visita a la comandancia del ejercito en campana no. 3, el ministro titere de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea dijo abiertamente que "hay que tomar la disposicion combativa con que pueden ganar los combates sorpresivos" mientras hablaba de la supuesta "provocacion del Norte de Corea".
					Por otra parte, los belicistas del ejercito titere surcoreano procuran mantener la ilegal "linea de limite al Norte en el Mar Oeste".
					
					Para este fin, reforzaron en el contorno de esa linea los medios belicos como buques de guerra.
					
					Ademas, ubicaron en la isla Yonphyong la nuevamente organizada "unidad en alerta para movilizarse dentro de 30 minutos" y realizaron en secreto el ejercicio de la batalla especial usando los aviones militares.
					
					Para colmo, fomentaron el ambiente de guerra librando los dias 13 y 14 el "ejercicio conjunto de ataque aereo intensivo" Sur de Corea-EE.UU.
					
					  En su declaracion fechada 16, el portavoz del Comite Nacional de Defensa de la Paz de Corea (CNDPC) revelo que tal disparate e imprudentes ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC constituyen una peligrosisima provocacion militar que partio del intento de desatar a toda costa la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC.
					
					  La realidad -prosiguio- demuestra claramente que la banda de Lee es el colectivo de connotados maniacos de guerra y traidores anti-reunificacion que niegan la unidad, la reunificacion y la paz de la nacion y tratan de imponer a los connacionales los flagelos a causa de la guerra.
					
					  Sera condenada a la ignominiosa derrota y a la muerte si esa horda sigue actuando desesperadamente para buscar la confrontacion fratricida y la guerra desafiando frontalmente a la aspiracion nacional a la paz y la reunificacion del pais, subrayo.
					
					  La camarilla de Lee debe actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que cuan tragico fue el fin de los que dieron espaldas a la aspiracion de la epoca y la nacion.

articles.title: No se aceptan desvios de declaraciones conjuntas N-S
articles.content:
No se aceptan desvios de declaraciones conjuntas N-S
Pyongyang, 16 de mayo (ATCC) -- Todos los coreanos deben frustrar tajantemente con sus fuerzas unidas las maniobras criminales de las fuerzas gobernantes del Sur de Corea que se apartan de las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur desafiando a la corriente de la epoca.
					 Esta conducta resulta una grave traicion a la nacion para desvirtuar la soberania y la dignidad nacionales y perseguir el servilismo y la dependencia de las grandes potencias rehusando el sagrado ideal independiente: "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual publicado este sabado y continua:
					
					  Ademas, ese imperdonable acto antipaz agrava el enfrentamiento militar y la tension en la Peninsula Coreana, acarrea el peligro de guerra nuclear y rechaza el desarrollo de las relaciones N-S y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					 La banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak aboga por "anular" el articulo de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio sobre la reunificacion pacifica insistiendo absurdamente que esto es para la "reunificacion a la manera comunista".
					
					 Ademas, niega la ejecucion de los articulos de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, que destaco la necesidad de acabar con las relaciones hostiles militares y establecer el sistema de paz duradera, calificandolos de "prematuros".
					
					  La realidad demuestra que si se apartan de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, las relaciones N-S seran condenadas a la ruptura y no se puede lograr la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales ni la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					  Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben atenerse firmemente a esas declaraciones, sagradas banderas de la reunificacion independiente de la nacion, y luchar con mas vigor por implementarlas.

articles.title: Rehabilitado magnificamente el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Rehabilitado magnificamente el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 16 de mayo (ATCC) -- Recientemente, fue reconstruido magnificamente el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang, enclavado a la orilla del pintoresco rio Taedong, como base para la vida cultural del pueblo.
					  Este inmueble historico, inaugurado en agosto del 49 (1960) de la Era Juche, es la cuna de la revolucion operistica donde se crearon las operas revolucionarias al estilo de "Mar de Sangre" y se estrenaron numerosas obras artisticas y literarias.
					
					  Como parte de la obra de reconstruccion, se renovaron todas las tejas de cuatro aguas del tipo coreano, se adornaron las paredes con originales materiales de construccion y adornos de relieve y se atribuyo al edificio la belleza contemporanea sin alterar su estructura interna.
					
					  En el techo del hall central quedaron descritas las 8 hadas del monte Kumgang volando en el cielo y los adornos de relieve de la pared adquirieron el color dorado mientras la iluminacion del techo de hall se torno discreta.
					
					  Mientras tanto, se instalaron nuevas aranas de gran tamano en el techo del zaguan y los pilares cilindricos enclavados en su suelo de granito se ataviaron con materiales de peculiares colores. Ademas, las paredes se adornaron originalmente con la magnolia y otras flores.
					
					  En cuanto al hall para el publico, toda la iluminacion del techo toma el rumbo a la escena y los pasos entre la graderia, antes en forma de escalera, se transformaron en los inclinados ligeramente sin peldanos.
					
					  El Teatro tiene mas de mil 300 asientos, equipos escenograficos, electroacusticos y de iluminacion, varias salas de ejercicio y maquillaje y facilidades de servicios publicos y sanitarias.
					
					  Ademas, cuenta con moderno equipo de modulacion y amplificadores, eficientes altavoces y otros, que permiten el efecto tridimensional del sonido y su alta calidad.
					
					  El remodelado Gran Teatro de Pyongyang demostro sus ventajas a traves de la ceremonia inaugural y la de clausura del XXVI Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera y las funciones de los artistas extranjeros ofrecidas en el marco de este evento. 
					
					  Los capitalinos se ponen muy satisfechos por su visita a ese magnifico centro cultural de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar), que se caracteriza por la perfecta armonia entre la estetica clasica nacional y la moderna y entre lo elegante, lo majestuoso y lo delicado.
